# List of international presidential trips made by Branko Crvenkovski

2008]]
The following is a list of state visits made by Branko Crvenkovski during his tenure as president of Macedonia from 2004 to 2009.
{| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin:1em auto 1em auto;"
|-
! class="unsortable" | Date !! Country !! class="unsortable" |Cities visited !! class="unsortable" |Note
|-
| July 7–8, 2005 ||  || Chișinău || Official State Visit

|-
| June 18–20, 2007 ||  || Berlin || Official State Visit
|-
| March 11–12, 2008 ||  || Bratislava || Official State Visit
|-
| May 10–11, 2007||  || Warsaw || Official State Visit
|-
| March 18, 2008 ||  || Ljubljana || Official State Visit
|-
| July 17, 2008 ||  || Tirana || Official State Visit
|-
| November 6–07, 2008 ||  || Zagreb || Official State Visit
|-
| December 11–12, 2008 ||  || Budapest || Official State Visit
|-
| February 10–11, 2009 ||  || Sofia, Plovdiv ||   Official State Visit
|-
| March 3–4, 2009 ||  || Sarajevo ||  Official State Visit
|}
